article_title: The BMW i3: A review of the automaker's new electric vehicle
article_text:

article_metadata.sailthru.author: Brian Dumaine

twitter.description: As I wind through the roads hugging the Pacific shore in Laguna Niguel, Calif., I see a steep hill ahead and gun the accelerator, afraid that the electric motor powering this small car won’t be u...
twitter.title: Road test: BMW’s ultimate, all-electric driving machine

article_metadata.description: The German automaker's new i3 promises good range. But does the EV accelerate and handle like a genuine Beamer?
